results.content: This course provides a good basic overview and I would recommend this to every new Joomla user
results.content_html: This course provides a good basic overview and I would recommend this to every new Joomla user

results.content: There's a lot of detail in this course - and it's served in quite small pieces that are easy to replay. The instructor understands that beginners come to this course with very little information. I really like the pace and depth of this course. I never felt overwhelmed with the difficulty - and I never felt bored because it was too easy.

results.content: It does not feels like a beginner course. there's some background knowledge require at this level, anyway i'm doing my research to catch up.

results.content: Installation process of Joomla is outdated. I struggled to install Wamp server and Joomla onto my computer which has Windows 10. The tutorial does not show how to install the latest Wamp Server. So far the rest of the course has been good.
results.content_html: Installation process of Joomla is outdated. I struggled to install Wamp server and Joomla onto my computer which has Windows 10. The tutorial does not show how to install the latest Wamp Server. So far the rest of the course has been good.

results.content: Very good for beginners like me, all explained and covered in great detail and in sync with the video presentation, which really simplifies the learning by seeing the results of actions as they are explained....
results.content_html: Very good for beginners like me, all explained and covered in great detail and in sync with the video presentation, which really simplifies the learning by seeing the results of actions as they are explained....

results.content:
This was my first class about Joomla (even though I've been playing with it for a couple years).  The information was indeed helpful, albeit repetitive in some places.  There were some things that different from my Joomla 3 look, but the ideas were general enough that I could figure out what was being explained.
Over all, I would say I am happy with this basic intro and I'm glad I took the course.  Thanks for the instruction!!
results.content_html:
This was my first class about Joomla (even though I've been playing with it for a couple years). The information was indeed helpful, albeit repetitive in some places. There were some things that different from my Joomla 3 look, but the ideas were general enough that I could figure out what was being explained.
Over all, I would say I am happy with this basic intro and I'm glad I took the course. Thanks for the instruction!!
